roleset.name: very slight invasion of malignant cells into adjacent tissue
roleset.note: MICROINVASION-N NOTES: Based on stratified data. Comparison with invasion. No Vn or Fn classes. Framed by Katie. (from microinvasion.01-n)

example.name: This is arg 1 rather than arg 0 because the definition of a DCIS microinvasion seperates the DCIS tumor (which includes necrosis) from the malignant cells
